pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.1_0: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.2_0: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ pañcahi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.3_0: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
